summary.para: Contains classes that implement the code completion functionality for End-User Report Designers.
Enables you to use the local code completion engine in End-User Report Designers.
Activates the local code completion engine and stores report layouts in memory.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.CodeCompletion.CodeCompletionRequestManager.UseLocalEngine(DevExpress.XtraReports.CodeCompletion.Storages.ICodeCompletionContextStorage)

summary.para: Activates the local code completion engine and stores report layouts in the specified storage.

member.param: A report layout storage that implements the ICodeCompletionContextStorage interface.

summary.para: Contains classes that implement storage for the code completion functionality in End-User Report Designers.
A file storage for the local code completion engine.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.CodeCompletion.Storages.FileCodeCompletionContextStorage.#ctor(System.String)

summary.para: Creates a new instance of the FileCodeCompletionContextStorage class with the specified folder.

member.param: A string that specifies the folder to store report layouts.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.CodeCompletion.Storages.FileCodeCompletionContextStorage.Clear(System.String)

summary.para: Removes the report layout with the specified key from storage.

member.param: A string that specifies the report layout’s key.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.CodeCompletion.Storages.FileCodeCompletionContextStorage.LoadCompletionContext(System.String,System.IO.Stream)

summary.para: Loads the report layout with the specified key from storage.

member.param: A string that specifies the report layout’s key.
A Stream object that contains the report layout to load.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.CodeCompletion.Storages.FileCodeCompletionContextStorage.SaveCompletionContext(System.String,System.IO.Stream)

summary.para: Saves the report layout to storage under the specified key.

member.param: A string that specifies the report layout’s key.
A Stream object that contains the report layout to save.

summary.para: Enables you to implement a custom report layout storage for the local code completion engine.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.CodeCompletion.Storages.ICodeCompletionContextStorage.Clear(System.String)

summary.para: If implemented, removes the report layout with the specified key from storage.

member.param: A string that specifies the report layout’s key.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.CodeCompletion.Storages.ICodeCompletionContextStorage.LoadCompletionContext(System.String,System.IO.Stream)

summary.para: If implemented, loads the report layout with the specified key from storage.

member.param: A string that specifies the report layout’s key.
A Stream object that contains the report layout to load.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.CodeCompletion.Storages.ICodeCompletionContextStorage.SaveCompletionContext(System.String,System.IO.Stream)

summary.para: If implemented, saves the report layout to storage under the specified key.

member.param: A string that specifies the report layout’s key.
A Stream object that contains the report layout to save.

summary.para: An in-memory storage for the local code completion engine.
Creates a new instance of the InMemoryCodeCompletionContextStorage class.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.CodeCompletion.Storages.InMemoryCodeCompletionContextStorage.Clear(System.String)

summary.para: Removes the report layout with the specified key from storage.

member.param: A string that specifies the report layout’s key.

summary.para: For internal use.

summary.para: Loads the report layout with the specified key from storage.

member.param: A string that specifies the report layout’s key.
A Stream object that contains the report layout to load.

summary.para: Saves the report layout to storage under the specified key.
